cars.description: This is an immaculate 2006 Nissan Rogue with only 25000 miles on it. Leather seats, power everything.
This is an immaculate 2006 Chevrolet Corvette with only 25000 miles on it. Leather seats, power everything.
This is an immaculate 2006 Toyota Prius with only 25000 miles on it. Leather seats, power everything.
